CURICULUM VITAE
I.
PERSONAL INFORMATION
Full Name: 
Do Minh Khoa
Date of Birth: 
September 29th, 1987
Address:
78/22/18 Ton That Thuyet, Ward 16, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City
Phone: 0834529987
E-mail: dmk.designer@gmail.com
Skype: jin_axl
II.
SKILLS & ABILITIES:
Skills:

Game Design: Have deep knowledge/ experience in almost every gaming genres, both in 
creation, balance, level design, logical pathing, planning, bug-base management, and 
documentation…

Illustration: Have high skill with sketching/ drawing/ coloring with a Wacom tablet. Have 
vast knowledge about art styles, variants, trends, color schemes, atmosphere… in games 
and designs.

Visual Design: Have good sense of design, especially in gaming characters, clothing, 
weapons and UI/ UX.

Animation: Have high skill in making animations for gaming characters, from drawing 
separated parts to model riggings and full-set animations.

Writing: Have good writing skill from common reports to deep analysis or specific essays. 
Have good literature knowledge in various ranges of topics.

Communication: Have good communication skill in Vietnamese/ English, both via verbal or 
e-mail. Can express and explain things in a clear and fluent manner.

Work Tool Mastery: Have expert – master level at necessary tools for working, ranging from
Word, Excel, Power Point, Adobe Photoshop to CLIP STUDIO PAINT, Spriter Pro…

Mentor: Have experience in coaching/ training others with effective communication and 
demonstration. 

Hardcore Gamer: Have over 20 years of hardcore gaming, ranging from handheld/ console/ 
PC/ mobile platforms
Abilities:

Can manage time, workload & stress effectively

Can work well both in team and alone

Can take & give feedback reasonably

Friendly & cooperative, willing to support

Willing to learn new things

Willing to share experience and knowledge with others
III.
ACADEMIC & WORKING HISTORY

2008 – 2012: Studying Industrial Design at Ho Chi Minh Architecture University

2014 – 2015: Working at NHN Entertainment (Vietnamese Branch) as Senior Artist

2015 – 2016: Working at CMN Online as Editor in Chief of Gamenoob.net (a gaming 
magazine focused on mobile/ MOBA games)

2017 – Now: Working at GAMELOFT (SAI Branch) as Game Designer of HRP Department 
(mainly in charge of porting mobile titles to portable consoles)

2013 – Now: Working part-time as Editor/ Writer for Vietgame.asia (a gaming magazine 
focused on mainstream games on multiple platforms)

2014 – Now: Working as Game Designer/ Artist/ Animator/ Project Manager for Self-
Employed Indie Game Studio (focused on hyper-casual games on mobile)
IV.
ACHIEVEMENT HIGH-LIGHTS
2015: Project Million Arthur (NHN Entertainment | TOAST | Square Enix)
Occupation: Senior 2D Artist
Duration: 9 months
Duty: Drawing new card artwork, checking overall quality and localization into Vietnamese, 
re-align the UI to fit for Vietnamese texts
2017: Project Gods of Rome (Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 6 months
Duty: Design new game-flow, UI and rules for the Local PVP feature (allow 2 players to play 
at the same time on one console). Also following the project until the GOLD phase (bug 
fixing, gameplay feedback, document control)
2017: Project BoBoiBoy Galaxy Run (WHAT Games | Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 3 months



Duty: Design new game-flow, UI and rules for the porting of the Android version to html5 
version with heavy constraint (>100MB to <7 MB, while keeping the graphic quality and FPS 
stable, with at least 80% of the content in-tact)
2017: Project PlayGiga | WizTV | MIGU
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 9 months
Duty: Design new game-flow, UI, controller adaptation, economic balance for various titles 
(Pastry Paradise, Asphalt 8/ Xtreme, Gods of Rome, Shark Dash, Dungeon Hunter 4, N.O.V.A 
3, Modern Combat 5..) from mobile to smart TV/ play-box platforms
2018: Project Game Evolution (Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 4 months
Duty: Design new innovation ideas to improve the downloading rate of Dead Rival, Gangstar 
Rio, City Mania…
2018: Project Asphalt 9 Legend (Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 4 months
Duty: Design new game-flow, UI, controller adaptation, economic balance for Asphalt 9 
Legend from mobile to smart TV/ play-box platforms
2019: Project Band of Badasses (WHAT Games | Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 3 months
Duty: Design new game-flow, UI, controller adaptation, economic balance for Band of 
Badasses from mobile to smart TV/ play-box platforms
2019: Project Cosmo Bounce (WHAT Games | Gameloft)
Occupation: Game Designer
Duration: 3 months
Duty: Design new game-flow, UI, controller adaptation, economic balance for Cosmo 
Bounce from mobile to smart TV/ play-box platforms





V.
WORK ETHIC
Always a gamer at heart, I strive to create new games targeted at every range of audience, and 
games that everyone can enjoy to the fullest – while trying to retain old good values.
With good knowledge about game development, I understand what should be done from every side 
of a developing team, thus I can give prompt supports and directions to make things work smoothly.
Having good experience working with limited resources and time constraint, I always try to look for 
the best solution before jumping into the work – which results in good time/ effort efficiency. 
Being both a Game Designer, an Artist, a Project Manager and an Animator, I have flexible visions 
from different perspectives to avoid unnecessary conflicts.
